Profilkép/string> Felhasználó név Fénykép kiválasztása Név megadása Crystal Logo Ikon lecserélése Crystal Rom Logóra Crystal Rom Verziója Crystal Rom kódneve Crystal Rom Branch Crystal Rom API Level Crystal Rom Flavour Ismeretlen X Ismeretlen Ismeretlen SHATTERED Előzmények törlése gomb Az előzmények törlése memória felszabadítási görgess fel és nyomd meg az összes törlése gombot CrystalShards MOD ME.
Hello blank fragment About The Crystal Rom Project:

 The idea of Crystal Rom born in late 2013. Thinking of a rom different from others at the time. Noticing that every rom has quite the same features of the others, I thought that if I created one, it should had a few but useful features.
 Thus, its effective implementation started on 9 Oct 2015 by making its initial base application: Y.A.M.P.: Yet Another Music Player, now the default music application. Then also other apps followed it, like the file manager, camera app, note and todo. Minor work has been done with aosp 6.0.1's source code, nothing relevant, with aosp 7.1 source code I started making a 'home' for the main tweaks. About the developer:

 Okay, first of all, before you start asking 'Eskilop' is a totally invented name, not based on anything. I was an android enthusiast, I started my 'developer' path making some applications, not that useful, but.. I was (and am) a modder, I started modding with my first phone: Samsung Galaxy Next Turbo (GT-S5570I) not my choice, in fact my parents gifted it to me, there weren't so much roms (pretty obvious) but then androidarmv6 team made a cm11 port for it and in that precise moment I started to 'study' what exactly they done to have that cm-11-stuff.zip that made my phone so 'new'. I started documenting how to build the Cyanogenmod for the GT-S5570I and i made it, after one week I was able to install my compiled version of the cm11. But I had no intenction to stop there, because I am very curious, so I started making some little (very little and irrilevant) changes to the easter-egg. Képernyőkép Stílus Használhatod a gyári vagy a vágott Képernyőkép mentést Gyári Vágot
